course_description: Enables students to apply the principles and methods learned in an academic setting through the preparation of a monograph that embodies original research applicable to public health, incorporating a hypothesis that has been successfully evaluated with appropriate statistical and epidemiological techniques and is potentially publishable and has public health impact.
sections: Class Nbr: 3061, Section #: 1, Type: THE, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: L. Christiansen-Lindquist, Status: Open
